feed.title: Fwd: Proposal for a new opcode

entry.title: Fwd: Proposal for a new opcode
entry.summary: In an email dated March 2, 2012, Watson Ladd proposed a new opcode for anonymous transactions. Gavin Andresen expressed excitement about the proposal and requested to read the paper for further details. He also mentioned that additional work may be required beyond introducing a new opcode in order to provide strong anonymity, such as creating new transaction types that clients can understand.
